==Trivia==
* In the English, German, and Indonesian localizations, the title of the soundtrack was mentioned during the quest ''[[Immernachtreich Apokalypse (Part 3)|Immernachtreich Apokalypse]]'' of the [[Version 2.8]] limited event ''[[Summertime Odyssey]]''.

===Etymology===
* "Sommernachtgarten" is German for "Summer Night Garden." This term was used as the name of the garden mentioned in the descriptions of [[Midsummer Courtyard]] and in Vol. 1 of the Book Collection ''[[Flowers for Princess Fischl]]''.
* "Sieh an, mein Sommernachtgarten!" roughly translates to "Behold, my Summer Night Garden!"
